scripts.start: npm run build && concurrently --kill-others "npm run serve" "npm run watch-sass"
scripts.dist: mkdir -p dist && npm run build-dist && sass src/style/index.scss dist/style.css --style compressed --embed-source-map
scripts.build: npm run build-sass && npm run build-js
scripts.build-dist: browserify src/index.js -g unassertify -g uglifyify -p bundle-collapser/plugin -p esmify | uglifyjs -mc > dist/bundle.js
scripts.preversion: npm run dist && npm run build
scripts.postversion: git commit -am 'build docs' --allow-empty && git push --no-verify && git push --tags --no-verify && npm publish
